short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Looks up YouGlish, a tool that provides the correct pronunciation of words via YouTube videos, for the selected text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A super simple and lightweight Chrome extension that helps you immediately use YouGlish without visiting the site, by selecting it from the context menu, or clicking on the extension icon to show the YouGlish lookup popup.
